summary: The default enchantments on the spectral weapons from Labyrinthian (Drainspell Bow, Drainheart Sword and Drainblood Battleaxe) have been removed, so they may be re-enchanted.
descriptionHtml:
So you\'re wandering around Skyrim and find a fantastic looking weapon, item of clothing or armour but oh no! It\'s enchanted, and that enchantment is rubbish! Wouldn\'t it be great if you could remove the enchantment without destroying the item? Well yes, but that isn\'t possible in game...but with this mod, the Drainspell Bow default enchantment is removed, so you can re-enchant the lovely looking ghost bow with whatever you like! Enjoy.

To install, simply unzip to your /Skyrim/Data directory.
To uninstall, delete the file, or disable by unticking it from the Skyrim launcher -> Data Files.

EDIT: Due to requests, I have uploaded a second, new .esp file (GhostWeaponsNoEnchants) that, as the name implies removes the base enchantments from all three of the ghostly weapons from Labyrinthian. With this mod, you may re-enchant them with whatever you wish. The new file incorporates all three weapons (including bow) rendering the first obsolete.

[u]My other mods:[/u]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14730]Shadowcloak Armour - Daedric Stealth Suit[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14687]Unbound Bow - Fires unlimited arrows[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23916]Invisibility Eyes Fix[/url] - Fixes the glitch whereby the player\'s eyes are messed up after turning invisible/visible
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25190]Summon Golden Saint spell[/url]
author: KingsGambit
